clusterList.phrase: well i feel that i'm back to where i was with catching the punts
obviously i love touching the ball you get a little bit more joy when you run back a punt or get a touchdown for the most part i get the same joy on third-and-4 when my receiver can't catch the ball
don't worry guys i got these i'm very good at free throws seriously free throws are probably the best facet of my game
the new offense helps but mainly it is just from having done all of this before that makes a huge difference

it's a huge jump from high school to college and again from college to the pros of having to know what's going on on the entire field and not just the 5 yards around you that's definitely taking a little bit of getting used to

all the time he's told me to set off the ball a lot more when i'm up too close sometimes the defenders can get a jump on me make sure that in certain situations you have to know what it is you have to know if you have to get out of your stance quicker on third and long because they are really going to be putting their ears back and coming just listening to vernon vernon knows what he's talking about samson's satele been out there for a year justin smiley has been in this this has been his fifth year and jake's long a great player just listen to all of those guys then you have the guys behind you that have played before too everyone around me has been giving me tips and really helping me out
we want to play fast-paced and defensively we want to be sitting there waiting on the offense we have to learn to play faster we feel like the new clock rules can give us an advantage
i'm feeling more comfortable reading the defenses a little faster getting the ball out of my hand making good throws

i am not a receiver i am not built to be a quarterback i take pride in doing the dirty work that is it i always have but being nose is just that i feel like it is one of the most important positions you have on the defense
the old wide receiver in me when you see guys struggling to pick up the blur of the ball that's one of the first things you look at
that's the most nervous i've been taking a batting practice in my entire life but it's out of the system
